job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: Join our team as a in Los Angeles, CA.  Magnite (NASDAQ: MGNI) is the worldâ€™s largest independent sell-side advertising platform. Anchored in sunny Los Angeles, bustling New York City, mile high Denver, historic London, and down under in Sydney, Magnite has offices across North America, EMEA, LATAM, and APAC. We are looking for a highly talented and motivated . We are looking for someone who is versatile, methodical, excited by modern technology and enjoys focusing on tackling software challenges. Does that sound like you?
